title: The Fed, Staring Down Two Big Choices, Charts an Aggressive Path
description: Federal Reserve officials are barreling toward another three-quarter-point increase in November, and they may decide to do more next year.
dc:creator: Jeanna Smialek
media:credit: Al Drago for The New York Times
media:description: The Federal Reserve is poised to raise interest rates three-quarters of a point next month.
